title: Student-Centered Design Workshop for Improving Online Learning Materials

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Science Knowledge and Experience in Using Online Learning Platforms
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, measuring learning effectiveness through project-based assessments. Learners in the role of general citizens possess advanced expertise in science domains

learning_goals: Learners can identify and document three or more areas for improvement in online science materials.
Learners revise existing learning materials at least once by incorporating peer feedback.
Learners complete the process of submitting improved materials using the TDA system.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
